contents.name: MaterialName

description: Provides methods to manage the Production preset.

contents.name: AddProduct
contents.description: Creates an object with the JobType from the address space.

contents.name: RemoveProduct
contents.description: Removes an object with the JobType from the address space.

contents.name: Products
contents.description: The products used in the scale aggregated in the Products Object.

description: Represents a product related to the scale.
comment: Model converted from OPC UA spec version 2.00 by Azure Opc2Dtdl converter v0.1.0.0 at 09/08/2025 15:50:08 UTC

contents.name: BatchId
contents.description: Defines a unique Id of this Batch.

contents.name: BatchName
contents.description: Defines the name of this Batch.

contents.name: JobId
contents.description: Defines a unique Id of this job.

contents.name: JobName
contents.description: Defines the name of this job.

contents.name: ProductName
contents.description: Defines the name of this product.

contents.name: ProductId
contents.description: Defines a unique Id of this product.

contents.name: Statistic
contents.description: Contains the different statistic values of the product.

description: Represents a product of an automatic filling scale.
comment: Model converted from OPC UA spec version 2.00 by Azure Opc2Dtdl converter v0.1.0.0 at 09/08/2025 15:50:08 UTC

contents.name: TareId
contents.description: Defines an Id of tare value for the current product or item.

contents.name: FeedRateMeasuringInterval
contents.description: Defines the measuring interval for evaluating the current flowrate.

contents.name: FillingTime
contents.description: Defines the maximal duration for the filling process to take place. Needs to be completed during this period.

contents.name: FineFeedWeight
contents.description: Defines the volume to be dosed in fine flow.

contents.name: InFlightWeight
contents.description: Defines the volume that is behind the valve / in flight after feeding is stopped.

contents.name: JogFeed
contents.description: Defines if an additional dosage is necessary.

contents.name: MinimumDeltaPerFeedRateMeasuringInterval
contents.description: Defines the minimum amount of weight data which needs to change within the FeedRateMeasuringInterval.

contents.name: SettlingTime
contents.description: Defines the time that needs to be passed before measurement process can be triggered.

contents.name: TargetWeight
contents.description: Defines the preset of the volume to be processed.

description: Represents a product of a Catchweigher.
comment: Model converted from OPC UA spec version 2.00 by Azure Opc2Dtdl converter v0.1.0.0 at 09/08/2025 15:50:08 UTC

contents.name: PresetHeight
contents.description: Defines the predefined height (in direction of global gravity) of the measured item. The value must be write before the item is measured.

contents.name: PresetLength
contents.description: Defines the predefined length (in direction of travel) of the measured item. The value must be written before the item is measured.

contents.name: PresetWidth
contents.description: Defines the predefined width (in third possible orthogonal direction to height and length) of the measured item. The value must be write before the item is measured.

contents.name: AddZone
contents.description: Adds a zone to the zone array.

contents.name: RemoveZone
contents.description: Removes a zone from the zone array.

description: Represents a product of a automatic weight-price-labeler.
comment: Model converted from OPC UA spec version 2.00 by Azure Opc2Dtdl converter v0.1.0.0 at 09/08/2025 15:50:08 UTC

contents.name: UnitPrice
contents.description: Defines the price per weight unit.

description: Represents a product of a Checkweigher.
comment: Model converted from OPC UA spec version 2.00 by Azure Opc2Dtdl converter v0.1.0.0 at 09/08/2025 15:50:08 UTC

contents.name: NominalWeight
contents.description: Defines the nominal (printed) weight of the product.

description: Represents a product of a continuous scale.
comment: Model converted from OPC UA spec version 2.00 by Azure Opc2Dtdl converter v0.1.0.0 at 09/08/2025 15:50:08 UTC

contents.name: MaterialDensity
contents.description: Defines the density of the used material.

contents.name: TargetFlowRate
contents.description: Defines a preset of flowrate that needs to be conveyed. This value defines the setpoint for the FlowRate control loop.

contents.name: TargetWeight
contents.description: Defines a preset of the volume to be processed.

description: Represents a product of a piece counting scale.
comment: Model converted from OPC UA spec version 2.00 by Azure Opc2Dtdl converter v0.1.0.0 at 09/08/2025 15:50:08 UTC

contents.name: CurrentItemCount
contents.description: Defines the current number of items that are captured by the scale.

contents.name: FeedRateMeasuringInterval
contents.description: Defines the measurement interval for evaluating the current flowrate.

contents.name: FillingTime
contents.description: Defines the interval during which the filling has to be completed.

contents.name: InFlightCount
contents.description: Defines the number of items that is behind valve / in flight after feeding is stopped.

contents.name: JogFeed
contents.description: Defines if an additional dosage is necessary.

contents.name: MinimumDeltaPerFeedRateMeasuringInterval
contents.description: Defines the minimum amount of weight that needs to change within the FeedRateMeasuringInterval. Otherwise the filling procedure is not valid.

contents.name: NumberOfReferencePieces
contents.description: Defines the number of pieces that need to be used for reference process.

contents.name: ReferencePieceWeight
contents.description: Defines the reference weight of a piece.

contents.name: RegisteredPieceCount
contents.description: Defines the number of pieces that were actually counted related to the ReferencePieceWeight.

contents.name: SettlingTime
contents.description: Defines the time that needs to be passed before measurement process can be triggered.

contents.name: TareId
contents.description: Defines the Id of tare value for the current product or item.

contents.name: TargetItemCount
contents.description: Defines the number of items that are supposed to be counted during the measurement process.

contents.name: TargetPieceCount
contents.description: Defines the number of pieces that need to be counted.

contents.name: TotalizedItemCount
contents.description: Defines the summed up number of items. Will be reset either triggered by the user or a different product selection.

contents.name: TotalizedWeight
contents.description: Defines the summed up number of weight. Will be reset either triggered by the user or a different product selection.

contents.name: SetTargetItemCount
contents.description: Set the number of TargetItemCount.

contents.name: SetTargetPieceCount
contents.description: Sets the value of TargetPieceCount. See TargetPieceCount.

description: Represents a product of a recipe scale.
comment: Model converted from OPC UA spec version 2.00 by Azure Opc2Dtdl converter v0.1.0.0 at 09/08/2025 15:50:08 UTC

contents.name: RecipeNodeId
contents.description: Defines the NodeId of the recipe that is being produced.

contents.name: Report
contents.description: Defines an array with the various messages from the recipe. Each RecipeElement generates its own report message.

contents.name: ReportFile
contents.description: Defines the file (binary, xml or other) that contains the report of the current process.

description: Represents a product of a simple scale.
comment: Model converted from OPC UA spec version 2.00 by Azure Opc2Dtdl converter v0.1.0.0 at 09/08/2025 15:50:08 UTC

description: Represents a product of a totalizing hopper scale.
comment: Model converted from OPC UA spec version 2.00 by Azure Opc2Dtdl converter v0.1.0.0 at 09/08/2025 15:50:08 UTC

contents.name: TipCounter
contents.description: Defines the number of fillings (downpour, bulk produce)

contents.name: VolumeTargetValue
contents.description: Defines the preset of the volume to be processed.

description: Represents a step, process or action in a recipe.
comment: Model converted from OPC UA spec version 2.00 by Azure Opc2Dtdl converter v0.1.0.0 at 09/08/2025 15:50:08 UTC

description: Represents an activation step in a recipe.
comment: Model converted from OPC UA spec version 2.00 by Azure Opc2Dtdl converter v0.1.0.0 at 09/08/2025 15:50:08 UTC

contents.name: TargetValueId
contents.description: Defines a unique Id of the aggregate that is being activated. A list of all possible TargetValueIds is defined in RecipeScaleDeviceType.

contents.name: TargetValue
contents.description: Defines the value to be reached of the TargetValue of an aggregate that is referenced by TargetValueId.

description: Represents a condition sleep step in a recipe.
comment: Model converted from OPC UA spec version 2.00 by Azure Opc2Dtdl converter v0.1.0.0 at 09/08/2025 15:50:08 UTC

contents.name: TargetThresholdValue
contents.description: The target value with which the threshold value is compared.

contents.name: ThresholdValueId
contents.description: Defines an Id of process value that needs to be monitored and is element of the SupportedThresholdValues in the RecipeScale.

contents.name: ThresholdValueNodeId
contents.description: The NodeId of process value that needs to be monitored and is element of the SupportedThresholdValues in the RecipeScale. This variable should be used if the value is part of the address space.

contents.name: Timeout
contents.description: Timeout specifies the duration within the TargetThresholdValue needs to be reached. If Timeout is exceeded and operator intervention is necessary.

description: Represents a condition sleep step in a recipe.
comment: Model converted from OPC UA spec version 2.00 by Azure Opc2Dtdl converter v0.1.0.0 at 09/08/2025 15:50:08 UTC

schemas.description: This enumeration describes the different condition modes for an analog condition.

contents.name: ConditionMode
contents.description: Defines the type of condition operator that is used.

description: Represents a condition sleep step in a recipe.
comment: Model converted from OPC UA spec version 2.00 by Azure Opc2Dtdl converter v0.1.0.0 at 09/08/2025 15:50:08 UTC

contents.name: ConditionMode
contents.description: Defines the type of condition operator that is used.

description: TimerType represents a timer step in a recipe. The recipe waits until at least Duration has passed from now.
comment: Model converted from OPC UA spec version 2.00 by Azure Opc2Dtdl converter v0.1.0.0 at 09/08/2025 15:50:08 UTC

contents.name: Duration
contents.description: Defines the period of time the processing needs to wait before processing the next RecipeElement.

description: UserInstructionType represents a recipe step that requires user interaction. The recipe scale display instruction (a text and/or some application- specific symbols) on an HMI and waits until the user acknowledged the instruction.
comment: Model converted from OPC UA spec version 2.00 by Azure Opc2Dtdl converter v0.1.0.0 at 09/08/2025 15:50:08 UTC

contents.name: DisplayText
contents.description: Defines instructions for this RecipeElement that will be displayed to the user.

contents.name: InstructionId
contents.description: Defines a unique Id used to identify the instruction that is displayed via DisplayText.

description: Represents a weighing process in a recipe. The process can be an automatic or manual filling process.
comment: Model converted from OPC UA spec version 2.00 by Azure Opc2Dtdl converter v0.1.0.0 at 09/08/2025 15:50:08 UTC

contents.name: TargetWeight
contents.description: Defines the preset of the volume to be processed.

contents.name: WeighingModuleNodeId
contents.description: Defines the Id of the load cell which is used for weighing the product.

contents.name: Material
contents.description: Defines the material which needs to be measured. Each material has different characteristics that are defined in MaterialType.

description: Contains methods and properties required for managing recipes.
comment: Model converted from OPC UA spec version 2.00 by Azure Opc2Dtdl converter v0.1.0.0 at 09/08/2025 15:50:08 UTC

contents.name: AddRecipe
contents.description: Method to add an additional recipe of RecipeType.

contents.name: RemoveRecipe
contents.description: Method to remove a recipe of RecipeType.

contents.name: Recipe_No
contents.description: Defines an instance of a recipe with the number No.

description: Represents a recipe. It defines additional methods and properties required for managing a recipe.
comment: Model converted from OPC UA spec version 2.00 by Azure Opc2Dtdl converter v0.1.0.0 at 09/08/2025 15:50:08 UTC

contents.name: RecipeId
contents.description: RecipeId defines a unique identifier of a recipe.

contents.name: RecipeName
contents.description: Defines a user-readable name of the recipe.

contents.name: RecipeElements
contents.description: Defines a Placeholder for all RecipeElements that are part of the Recipe.

description: Container for the different statisticvalues needed in a Checkweigher.
comment: Model converted from OPC UA spec version 2.00 by Azure Opc2Dtdl converter v0.1.0.0 at 09/08/2025 15:50:08 UTC

contents.name: Weighed
contents.description: This flag indicates that the element is considered in the weighed statistic.

description: Container for the different statisticvalues. All variables are optional, so that the statistics can be instantiated application-specific.
comment: Model converted from OPC UA spec version 2.00 by Azure Opc2Dtdl converter v0.1.0.0 at 09/08/2025 15:50:08 UTC

contents.name: ResetCondition
contents.description: The reason and context for the reset of the statistics, which is done without a trigger from an OPC UA Client, like calling the ResetStatistics Method. ResetCondition is a vendor-specific, human readable string. ResetCondition is non-localized and might contain an expression that can be parsed by certain clients. Examples are: “AFTER 4 HOURS”, “AFTER 1000 ITEMS”, “OPERATOR”. “OPERATOR” means, that an operator resets the statistics on a local HMI.

contents.name: StartTime
contents.description: Indicates the point in time at which the collection of the statistical data has been started.

description: Container for the different statisticvalues. All variables are optional, so that the statistics can be instantiated application-specific. Should be used for application-specific statistics.
comment: Model converted from OPC UA spec version 2.00 by Azure Opc2Dtdl converter v0.1.0.0 at 09/08/2025 15:50:08 UTC

description: Represents a feeder system. A feeder system is a subdevice of an automatic scale for conveying the product to or from the WeighingBridge.
comment: Model converted from OPC UA spec version 2.00 by Azure Opc2Dtdl converter v0.1.0.0 at 09/08/2025 15:50:08 UTC

contents.name: FeederRunning
contents.description: Indicates that the feeder system is running.

contents.name: FeederLoad
contents.description: Defines the current loaded weight on the feeder system.

contents.name: FeederSpeed
contents.description: Defines the current speed of a feeder system. The unit of the FeederSpeed depends on the construction system.

contents.name: MaximumFeederSpeed
contents.description: Defines the maximal possible speed of the feeder.

contents.name: MinimalFeederSpeed
contents.description: Defines the minimal possible speed of the feeder.

contents.name: SetFeederSpeed
contents.description: Allows to set a new value for the speed of the feeder system. The OPC UA server must check if the value is between the minimal and maximum allowed speed and if the unit is allowed.

description: Represents a printing device. A printing device is a subdevice of a scale, that prints labels or other documents releated to the scale or the measurement results.
comment: Model converted from OPC UA spec version 2.00 by Azure Opc2Dtdl converter v0.1.0.0 at 09/08/2025 15:50:08 UTC

contents.name: LabelLength
contents.description: Defines the length of the labels in stock.

contents.name: LabelStock
contents.description: Indicates the level of labels in stock in percent.

contents.name: LabelTypeId
contents.description: Defines the Id of the label to be printed.

contents.name: LabelWidth
contents.description: Defines the width of the labels in stock.

contents.name: PrintMediaStock
contents.description: Defines the level of the print media in percent (e.g. ink, wear of thermal element, etc)

description: Represents a scale.
comment: Model converted from OPC UA spec version 2.00 by Azure Opc2Dtdl converter v0.1.0.0 at 09/08/2025 15:50:08 UTC

contents.name: MaterialClass
contents.description: Defines the allowed material the scale may measure. Only relevant for certain scales (e.g. totalizing hopper scale or continuous scale)

contents.name: ProcessStateId
contents.description: Contains an relating identification for the occurring ProcessStateMessage.

contents.name: ProcessStateMessage
contents.description: Contains the message of the current overall state of the scale.

contents.name: CurrentWeight
contents.description: Defines the current value that is measured at the sensor at the current timestamp. Might be a highly fluctuating value.

contents.name: RegisteredWeight
contents.description: Defines the last valid measurement that was recorded and will be used for further processing. This is the legal registered value of the scale.

contents.name: ProductionPreset
contents.description: Contains the productions presets.

description: Represents an automatic filling scale.
comment: Model converted from OPC UA spec version 2.00 by Azure Opc2Dtdl converter v0.1.0.0 at 09/08/2025 15:50:08 UTC

contents.name: ToleranceState
contents.description: Describes the state of the tolerance deviation. The option under and over needs to be determined via TargetItemType information of TargetWeight.

contents.name: Deviation
contents.description: Defines the relative amount of over (positive value) or under (negative value) dosed value in relation of the TargetWeight.

description: Represents a Catchweigher. It has no method or properties defined.
comment: Model converted from OPC UA spec version 2.00 by Azure Opc2Dtdl converter v0.1.0.0 at 09/08/2025 15:50:08 UTC

description: Represents an automatic weight-price-labeler.
comment: Model converted from OPC UA spec version 2.00 by Azure Opc2Dtdl converter v0.1.0.0 at 09/08/2025 15:50:08 UTC

description: Represents a Checkweigher.
comment: Model converted from OPC UA spec version 2.00 by Azure Opc2Dtdl converter v0.1.0.0 at 09/08/2025 15:50:08 UTC

contents.name: TU1Percent
contents.description: Permitted percentage of items with weight less than TU1

description: Represents a continuous scale.
comment: Model converted from OPC UA spec version 2.00 by Azure Opc2Dtdl converter v0.1.0.0 at 09/08/2025 15:50:08 UTC

contents.name: FlowRate
contents.description: Defines the conveying capacity in volume per time.

contents.name: MaxFlowRate
contents.description: Defines the maximum volume that may be conveyed. Largest volume per time.

contents.name: MinFlowRate
contents.description: Defines the minimum volume that can be conveyed. Smallest volume per time.

contents.name: Totalizer
contents.description: Defines the overall volume that was conveyed over a defined duration. Multiple object may be instantiated depending on the use case.

contents.name: MasterTotalizer
contents.description: Defines the overall volume that was conveyed over the lifetime of the scale.

description: Represents a loss in weight scale.
comment: Model converted from OPC UA spec version 2.00 by Azure Opc2Dtdl converter v0.1.0.0 at 09/08/2025 15:50:08 UTC

contents.name: Discharging
contents.description: Indicates that a discharging process is taking place.

contents.name: DischargeStart
contents.description: Starts a discharging process.

contents.name: DischargeStop
contents.description: Stops a discharging process.

contents.name: RefillStart
contents.description: Starts a refilling process.

contents.name: RefillStop
contents.description: Stops a refilling process.

description: Represents a piece counting scale.
comment: Model converted from OPC UA spec version 2.00 by Azure Opc2Dtdl converter v0.1.0.0 at 09/08/2025 15:50:08 UTC

contents.name: CurrentPieceCount
contents.description: Defines the number of pieces that are currently measured related to the ReferencePieceWeight.

contents.name: ReferenceOptimisationRange
contents.description: Defines the tolerance range within the scale may optimize the ReferencePieceWeight.

contents.name: SetReferencePieceWeight
contents.description: Sets the value for the ReferencePieceWeight (product-specific data).

contents.name: StartReference
contents.description: Triggers the reference weighing process.

description: RecipeScaleType represents a recipe scale.
comment: Model converted from OPC UA spec version 2.00 by Azure Opc2Dtdl converter v0.1.0.0 at 09/08/2025 15:50:08 UTC

contents.name: SupportedTargetValues
contents.description: Defines a list of values that may be set via the recipe.

contents.name: SupportedThresholdValues
contents.description: Defines a list of threshold values that may be used within one recipe.

contents.name: Recipes
contents.description: Defines a folder that contains all recipes. Elements in this folder must have the RecipeType.

description: Represents a simple scale.
comment: Model converted from OPC UA spec version 2.00 by Azure Opc2Dtdl converter v0.1.0.0 at 09/08/2025 15:50:08 UTC

description: Represents a hopper scale.
comment: Model converted from OPC UA spec version 2.00 by Azure Opc2Dtdl converter v0.1.0.0 at 09/08/2025 15:50:08 UTC

contents.name: Limits
contents.description: Defines a placeholder for individual additional limits that may be reached.

contents.name: LimitMax
contents.description: The current fill level exceeds the allowed maximum level.

contents.name: LimitMin
contents.description: The current fill level falls below the allowed minimum level.

contents.name: LevelMax
contents.description: Defines a the maximum fill level where a action is necessary.

contents.name: LevelMin
contents.description: Defines a the minimum fill level where a action is necessary.

description: Represents a laboratory scale.
comment: Model converted from OPC UA spec version 2.00 by Azure Opc2Dtdl converter v0.1.0.0 at 09/08/2025 15:50:08 UTC

contents.name: CalibrationNeeded
contents.description: Defines if a calibration procedure is needed and the current process should be paused.

contents.name: CalibrationRunning
contents.description: Defines if a calibration procedure is running.

contents.name: DraftShieldLeftClosed
contents.description: Defines if the left draft shield is closed.

contents.name: DraftShieldRightClosed
contents.description: Defines if the right draft shield is closed.

contents.name: DraftShieldTopClosed
contents.description: Defines if the top draft shield is closed.

contents.name: LevelingRunning
contents.description: Defines if a levelling process is running.

contents.name: CloseDraftShields
contents.description: Method to close a certain or all draft shields.

contents.name: OpenDraftShields
contents.description: Method to open a certain or all draft shields.

contents.name: StartCalibration
contents.description: Method to start the automatic calibration procedure.

contents.name: StartIonisator
contents.description: Method to start the ionization process.

contents.name: StartLeveling
contents.description: Method to start the automatic leveling procedure of the scale.

contents.name: StopIonisator
contents.description: Method to stop the ionization process.

description: Represents a weighing bridge.
comment: Model converted from OPC UA spec version 2.00 by Azure Opc2Dtdl converter v0.1.0.0 at 09/08/2025 15:50:08 UTC

description: Represents a totalizing hopper scale.
comment: Model converted from OPC UA spec version 2.00 by Azure Opc2Dtdl converter v0.1.0.0 at 09/08/2025 15:50:08 UTC

description: Represents a scale system and contains one or more scales.
comment: Model converted from OPC UA spec version 2.00 by Azure Opc2Dtdl converter v0.1.0.0 at 09/08/2025 15:50:08 UTC

contents.name: Policy
contents.description: Defines the legal guidelines that apply for the scale or need to be complied by the scale.

contents.name: ProcessStateId
contents.description: Contains an relating identification for the occurring ProcessStateMessage.

contents.name: ProcessStateMessage
contents.description: Contains the message of the current overall state of the scale.

contents.name: ProductionPreset
contents.description: Contains the productions presets.

contents.name: SubDevices
contents.description: The Scales must be a subtype of the ScaleDeviceType but must not be from the same type.

description: Contains the sum over the last measurement results.
comment: Model converted from OPC UA spec version 2.00 by Azure Opc2Dtdl converter v0.1.0.0 at 09/08/2025 15:50:08 UTC

contents.name: TotalizedValue
contents.description: Defines a summed up/totalized volume within a period of time.

contents.name: ResetTotalizer
contents.description: Resets the TotalizedValue of this totalizer object. Only useful if reset is not related to a period of time.

contents.name: ItemId
contents.description: Defines a unique number that is assigned to an item.

contents.name: MeasuredHeight
contents.description: Defines the maximum height (in direction of travel) of the measured item.

contents.name: MeasuredLength
contents.description: Defines the maximum measured length (in direction of travel) of the measured item.

contents.name: MeasuredVolume
contents.description: Defines the volume of the item.

contents.name: MeasuredWeight
contents.description: Defines the registered weight that may be unmistakeable referenced to one item.

contents.name: MeasuredWidth
contents.description: Defines the maximum width (in third possible orthogonal direction to height and length) of the measured item.

contents.name: ItemPrice
contents.description: ItemPrice defines the price related to measured weight and UnitPrice.

description: For each weighing range a scale supports the OPC UA server provides an object of WeighingRangeElementType that contains the propertys of the weighing range like the ScaleDivision.
comment: Model converted from OPC UA spec version 2.00 by Azure Opc2Dtdl converter v0.1.0.0 at 09/08/2025 15:50:08 UTC

contents.name: ActualScaleInterval
contents.description: Value expressed in units of mass of the difference between two consecutive indicated values, for digital indication ('d' as described in Welmec /OIML).

contents.name: Range
contents.description: Defines the range within the scale may be operated depending on the additional parameters within this type.

contents.name: VerificationScaleInterval
contents.description: Value, expressed in units of mass, used for the classification and verification of an instrument. ('e' as described in Welmec /OIML)

description: Container for the weighing zones in a Checkweigher.
comment: Model converted from OPC UA spec version 2.00 by Azure Opc2Dtdl converter v0.1.0.0 at 09/08/2025 15:50:08 UTC

contents.name: LowerLimit
contents.description: Defines the lower weight limit of this zone. The lower limit is prior to the upper limit if two zones are beside each other.

contents.name: Name
contents.description: Defines the user-readable name of the zone.

contents.name: UpperLimit
contents.description: Defines the upper weight limit of this zone.

contents.name: ZoneStatistic
contents.description: Contains statistics regarding this zone.
